description: Schema condition logic is incorrect - uses equality check instead of highlighting selected item
suggestedFix: Remove condition from list component and add conditional styling to list-item based on selectedItem signal

description: Missing click interaction handler in Schema and LiquidCode
suggestedFix: Add interaction/event handler to list-item that emits selectedItem signal with current item value

description: Missing conditional styling for selected vs unselected states
suggestedFix: Add styling properties or classes that change based on selectedItem signal comparison with current item

description: Missing hover state styling present in JSX
suggestedFix: Add hover state styling to list-item container

description: LiquidCode syntax appears to have structural differences that don't match the nested container pattern
suggestedFix: Ensure LiquidCode properly represents the container hierarchy with list > list-item > text structure

description: Missing spacing and visual styling attributes (padding, rounded corners, transitions)
suggestedFix: Add appropriate styling properties to match JSX visual appearance

description: JSX shows all tab content simultaneously, but LiquidCode implements conditional rendering based on @view signal for proper tab switching functionality
suggestedFix: JSX should implement state management and conditional rendering to show only the active tab's content, or LiquidCode should remove conditional logic to match JSX behavior

description: JSX uses anchor tags (<a>) for tabs, while Schema uses button elements and LiquidCode uses Bt (button) elements
suggestedFix: Standardize tab elements across all representations - recommend using buttons for better accessibility

description: Schema lacks the @view signal and conditional rendering logic present in LiquidCode
suggestedFix: Add @view signal declaration and conditional rendering conditions to Schema elements

description: JSX has rich content structure with headers (h3) and paragraphs (p) for each tab, while Schema and LiquidCode only have simple text elements
suggestedFix: Schema and LiquidCode should include header elements and additional text elements to match JSX content structure

description: JSX includes hover interactions and styling that are not represented in Schema or LiquidCode
suggestedFix: Add hover state definitions and styling properties to Schema and LiquidCode

description: LiquidCode includes a HEADER element (0!h[Tx"HEADER"]) that doesn't exist in JSX or Schema
suggestedFix: Remove the HEADER element from LiquidCode or add corresponding header to JSX and Schema
